Lead Java Developer – SC Cleared

  • July 29, 2020

Lead Java Developer – SC Cleared

A chance to help a respected Digital consultancy working on a Public Sector project that is already underway.

We are looking for somebody with experience in a client facing role where they have built and lead engineering teams. Any Public Sector experience will be beneficial.

Skills:

  • Java 8+
  • RESTful APIs
  • Spring
  • CI/CD
  • Gradle or Maven
  • AWS or Azure

This role will be remote for the time being with client site visit to Central London when it is safe to do so again.

For further details and to be considered for this role please hit apply or get in touch with Jack at SR2.

Job Information

Job Reference: JHJL2907_1596043183
Salary:
Salary From: £400
Salary To: £500
Job Industries: IT
Job Locations: London
Job Types: Contract
Job Skills: Java, Spring, AWS
